name: ntrtop
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c1), c1))

stmt.origin: mpbid(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(cfv(cnt, c0), c1), c1), wcel(c1, c0))

comment: The interior of a topology's underlying set is the entire set. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2006.)
